name: Survive It
description:
This game is about the typical zombie invasion. It is your job to help certain locations with their zombie infestation. Defend yourself againts waves of zombies, and earn a new weapon after each wave. When all the waves are defeated, you will return to the underground and try again. OR take a break from the hell above!

This game is for Oculus Quest and Quest 2 only at the moment. 

Thank you very much for checking out the game, and we will try our best to improve the game development in this project and/or future projects.

Controls:

Walk: Left Thump stick

Snap Rotate: Right Thump stick

Grap weapon/objects: Grip Buttons

Shoot: Trigger Buttons

Eject Magazine: B/Y
